snippet.title: Free demo for co-op open world FPS just got a huge update!
snippet.description:
Echo Point Nova is an open world shooter made by the team behind Severed Steel, features singleplayer and co-op play for up to 4 players!

Try the demo here!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1836730/Echo_Point_Nova/

Full game launching later this year.
